channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Surgeon gave girlfriend anesthesia drugs to control her, prosecutors say
item.description: Victim's mother says Dr. James Ryan noticed Sarah Harris years earlier in a toy store where she was dressed as Elsa from "Frozen."

item.title: Trump predicts 'big week' in Russia-Ukraine peace talks
item.description: President Donald Trump suggested imminent progress in peace talks between Russia and Ukraine in a post to Truth Social early on Sunday.

item.title: Turkish Tufts University student back in Boston after release from Louisiana detention center
item.description: A Tufts University student from Turkey has returned to Boston after being released from a Louisiana immigration detention center.

item.title: WATCH: Nashville Zoo announces birth of tiny southern pudu
item.description: Nashville Zoo celebrated Mother’s Day early as it announced the birth of a male southern pudu.

item.title: WATCH: Animals react as earthquake rattles Tennessee
item.description: Animals reacted as a 4.1 preliminary magnitude earthquake rattled parts of Tennessee Saturday. No injuries or damages were immediately reported.
